text: Farzad Baher (; born 1993) is an Iranian sabre fencer and was also a member of the Iranian sabre fence in 2013 Budapest and 2014 Kazan. ==References== * * * Category:Iranian male fencers Category:Living people Category:1993 births Category:Sportspeople from Tabriz Category:Iranian Azerbaijani sportspeople Category:Fencers at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Fencers at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games medalists in fencing Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Universiade medalists in fencing Category:Universiade silver medalists for Iran Category:Asian Games competitors for Iran Category:Medalists at the 2017 Summer Universiade
title: Farzad Baher
